text:
TO2 NAEB Board of Directors
FROM; Jack Westbrook (WOT), Chairman, Network Acceptance Subcommittee
Re: Report ae of April X* 1955«
The report of the NAEB Radio Network Acceptance Subcommittee is
brief, to the point, and is a simple raatter of figures^
Since our appointment in November, we have had 2^ offerings for
evaluationo As of April 2, we had acted on 19 of these, giving
17 approvals and two' reJactions„ We still have five on which to
take action,,
Though the total actions of the subcommittee have been nearly
unanimous, it should be noted that unanimity in voting for
approval or rejection has not been nearly so prevalent There
have been many two-to-one votes, for or againsto
ecs Waldo Abbot
